_AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceTextSim: The document was sealed with a keyless digital signature.
_AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceTextFul: The document was sealed with a keyless digital signature by Scrive E-sign.
_AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceTextSi: The document was sealed with a digital signature.
_AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceTextFu: The document was sealed with a digital signature by Scrive E-sign..
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceTextSimpleNotAr: Scrive prepared the final PDF, including evidence collected by Scrive, before sealing with a digital signature.
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceTextFullArchive: Scrive E-sign prepared the final PDF.
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceTextFullNotArch: Scrive E-sign prepared the final PDF, including evidence collected by Scrive E-sign, before sealing with a digital signature.
_AutomaticReminderSentTextSimple: An automatic reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$.
_AutomaticReminderSentTextFull: An automatic reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ at the request of $author$.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleArchive: The invitation to sign was withdrawn.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleNotArch: The invitation to sign was withdrawn by $actor$.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextFullArchive: The invitation to sign was withdrawn.The possibility to sign was disabled by Scrive E-sign.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextFullNotArchiv: The invitation to sign was withdrawn by $actor$.The possibility to sign was disabled by Scrive E-sign.
_CloseDocumentEvidenceTextSimple: Scrive locked the document from further modifications by the signing parties.
_CloseDocumentEvidenceTextFull: Scrive E-sign locked the document from further modifications by the signing parties.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToSignSim: The invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToReviewS: The invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToSignFul: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToReviewF: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToSignSimpl: The invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToReviewSim: The invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToSignFull: Scrive E-sign’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToReviewFul: Scrive E-sign’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignArchiveSimp: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewArchiveSi: An invitation to review  was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignNotArchiveS: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewNotArchiv: An invitation to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignArchiveFull: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to Scrive E-sign’s online interface to sign documents. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewArchiveFu: An invitation to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to Scrive E-sign’s online interface to sign documents. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignNotArchiveF: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive E-sign. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to Scrive E-sign’s online interface to sign documents. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewNotArchiv: An invitation to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive E-sign. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to Scrive E-sign’s online interface to sign documents. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextSimpleA: The invitation could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextSimpleN: The invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextFullArc: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextFullNot: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextSimpleArc: The invitation could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextSimpleNot: The invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextFullArchi: Scrive E-sign’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextFullNotAr: Scrive E-sign’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToSignSim: The invitation to sign (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToReviewS: The invitation to review (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToSignFul: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation to sign (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToReviewF: Scrive E-sign’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation to review (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_PreparationToPendingEvidenceTextSimpleN: The preparation of the signing process settings was finished by $actor$ .The signing process was initiated.
_PreparationToPendingEvidenceTextFullNot: The preparation of the signing process settings was finished by $actor$, and Scrive E-sign locked the document from editing. The signing process language was set to $lang$, and the signing due date was set to $timeouttime$ UTC.$if(timezone)$ The time zone $timezone$ was provided by $actor$$endif$$endif$. The signing process was initiated.
ProlongDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing was prolonged$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
RejectDocumentEvidenceText:
The invitation to sign was rejected$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.$_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled()$$if(text)$ The rejection message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
ReminderSendText:
A reminder$_to_review_or_sign()$ was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$$if(!archive)$ at the request of $actor$$endif$.$if(text)$ The reminder message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
ResealedPDFText: $if(full)$Preparation of the Evidence Package was requested by $if(!archive)$$actor$, $endif$a person authorised to administer $_TheScriveSystem()$.$endif$
RestartDocumentEvidenceText: The document was opened for editing$if(!archive)$ by $actor$ in $_TheScriveSystem()$’s interface to design signing processes$endif$.
SMSPinDeliveredEvidenceText: The SMS with the PIN was delivered to $text$ for $signatory$ to use for identification.
SMSPinSendEvidenceText: An SMS with a PIN was sent to $text$ for $signatory$ to use for identification.
SignDocumentEvidenceText:
The document was signed$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$$_using_identification_method()$.$if(sms_pin)$$if(full)$ The PIN was sent to $phone$.$endif$$elseif(eleg)$$if(full)$

The text signed in the eID client was: 

$infotext$

E-legitimation provider: $provider$.

$if(fieldsverified)$

Information about signatory verified by $provider$: $if(fstnameverified)$ First name; $endif$ $if(lstnameverified)$ Last name; $endif$ $if(persnumverified)$ Personal number; $endif$

$endif$

Signature:

$signature$

$if(certificate)$

Certificate:

$certificate$

$endif$ $if(ocsp)$

Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Response:

$ocsp$

$endif$$endif$$endif$
SignWithELegFailureEvidenceText: $_TheScriveSystem()$ rejected the attempt by $signatory$ to sign the document. The reason was that the identity information of $signatory$ did not match the identity information received from the external eID system.$if(full)$ Information given by the external eID system: $msg$.$endif$
SignatoryLinkVisitedText: $if(full)$The link in the invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ was clicked$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$. $endif$The document was opened $if(!archive)$by $actor$ $endif$$if(full)$in $_TheScriveSystem()$’s online interface to sign documents$else$online$endif$.
TimeoutDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing the document passed.$_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled()$
_TheEmailSystemReportsThatTheInvitation: $if(full)$$_TheScriveSystem()$’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation$else$The invitation$endif$
_ThePossibilityToSignIsDisabled: $if(full)$ The possibility to sign was disabled by Scrive E-sign.$endif$
_TheSMSSystemReportsThatTheInvitation: $if(full)$$_TheScriveSystem()$’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation$else$The invitation$endif$
_using_identification_method: $if(eleg)$ using eID as identification method$elseif(sms_pin)$ using PIN by SMS as identification method$endif$
_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign:
$if(text)$$if(!mobile)$ The invitation to sign contained the following message:
$text:noescape()$$endif$$endif$
_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview:
$if(text)$$if(!mobile)$ The invitation to review contained the following message:
$text:noescape()$$endif$$endif$
